name: @repo/e2e-tests
description: Playwright smoke and staging monitors for TenantFlow.

scripts.test: doppler run -- pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:chromium: doppler run --preserve-env=PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL,E2E_OWNER_EMAIL,E2E_OWNER_PASSWORD,E2E_TENANT_EMAIL,E2E_TENANT_PASSWORD -- pnpm exec playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:mobile: doppler run --preserve-env=PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL,E2E_OWNER_EMAIL,E2E_OWNER_PASSWORD,E2E_TENANT_EMAIL,E2E_TENANT_PASSWORD -- pnpm exec playwright test --project=mobile-chrome
scripts.test:performance: doppler run --preserve-env=PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL -- pnpm exec playwright test tests/performance.spec.ts
scripts.test:accessibility: doppler run --preserve-env=PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL -- pnpm exec playwright test tests/accessibility.spec.ts
scripts.test:contracts: doppler run --preserve-env=PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL -- pnpm exec playwright test tests/integration/api-contracts.spec.ts
scripts.test:stripe: doppler run --preserve-env=PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL,E2E_OWNER_EMAIL,E2E_OWNER_PASSWORD,E2E_TENANT_EMAIL,E2E_TENANT_PASSWORD -- pnpm exec playwright test tests/stripe-payment-flow.e2e.spec.ts tests/stripe-disputes-fraud.e2e.spec.ts
